channel.title: Adding commands
channel.description: hello iv started my server and stuff but i noticed theres no commands im wondering if anyone can help me skype is kyle.k542

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

Post source type. If it’s an old 317 it’s likely under

inside client.java
If it’s above delta it would probably be in Commands.java
If it’s above a 474 it would likely be somewhere among src/player/Commands.java or something like that. Can’t remember well.

The format for a command to be added in old 317:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("testCommand")) {
       sendMessage("This test command is functioning");
}

Above that it would be something like

if (c.playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("testCommand")) {
          c.sendMessage("This test command is functioning."));
}

[/code]

Read full topic
